mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (user_name, pass_ward, name, sex, id_number, phone, email, status, type, create_time, last_login_time, update_time ) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passWard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pass_ward = #{passWard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, pass_ward, name, sex, id_number, phone, email, status, type, create_time, last_login_time, update_time from user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_name, pass_ward, name, sex, id_number, phone, email, status, type, create_time, last_login_time, update_time from user
